website_summaries.verdict: Although they won't work for all burners, they have a lot to offer for the ranges that can accommodate them. Great for gas or electric, and consumers that prefer round, disposable protectors.
pros: Different from other protectors on our list for being round instead of square
Includes 2 sizes in the pack of 50
Does a good job catching spills on burners that they fit
Can be used on gas and electric burners
cons: Made of aluminum foil that is on the thin side
Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I'll buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be the same quality as the traditional disposable aluminum baking pans. However, I was wrong. They came bent up, they don't fit a standard electric range. Very cheaply made. Better off getting heavy duty foil and lining your own drip pans.
customer_reviews.author: girlforhim

customer_reviews.title: These things are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Just put them on when I received my new stove yesterday so I haven't used them yet to give an accurate rating. One I do I will issue an accurate one. UPDATE: These are amazing as keeping my stove top clean! So glad I bought them and will again when I use all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Guillebeau

customer_reviews.title: Yay modern technology
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the primary cook, ergo cooked on food. I have OCD (like Monk) and was tired of a dirty looking stove top. These things are perfect! They have nice substance, were easy to slide on, and fit great. I will never again scrub those trays. These are sized perfectly and should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: t2stoner

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Burner Bibs for GE Electric Stove
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs because they protect my stove from every day cooking such as frying and spills. I had a major spill over Christmas when a large coffee cup was being filled while on the stove and it got tipped over. I had to clean the top of the stove, but very little of the coffee went under the burners. The only thing I don't like about the bibs is that I wish they were a little stronger and larger.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, they are a bit more flimsy than I had expected but still seem more sturdy than my aluminum foil. The smaller ones fit perfectly while the larger ones are a tad bit to small but will still do the job. I think the price is a bit much but I will order again anyway because I prefer the look of these bibs to the look of the trays wrapped in foil.
customer_reviews.author: Kales121

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for the less domestically inclined
customer_reviews.text: These are quite handy to avoid having to clean the burner pans after a spill, or throw out the more expensive chrome ones and buy new periodically, now you can just change the foil ones in a matter of seconds and back to "cookin" Also much easier than trying to wrap aluminum foil around the chrome burner pans. Seems like a good seller too, had these delivered to my house in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have kids learning to cook in my house so I get a lot of spills in the burners that get left there. I thought I would try these so I don't have to replace the reflectors so often. They seem to work pretty good so far!. I think it is a great idea. You just throw them out when they get dirty and put another one in. It's fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: These fit well under my electric burners. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit well under my electric burners. They are so handy. I cook a lot and was scouring the under part original burners all of the time. I use these about a month or so. More for the burners I use a lot, less for the others. Then, depending how yucky they are, I recycle or toss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally save my new stove!
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are thin but they are meant to be disposable I actually used mines for 6 months I could have thrown them away sooner but I wasn’t as cooking as much but now I’m home with Covid pandemic .. super easy toss and get a new one
customer_reviews.author: Zana R

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: use these in my rentals Airbnbs saves the burner pans and a lot of clean up. I wish you could buy them in just small or large as I have a small apartment stove that has 3 small burners.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: They are not easy to find at the local stores anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find these liners again. They are not easily available in the stores like they used to be. I have vacation rentals. I like to use the liners to keep the drip pans from rusting out, and looking dirty. They are pricey for what they are, but still cheaper than having to constantly replace drip pans.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: They fit the Amana Electric just fine. The price is okay. They arrived pretty quick in an envelope. I'm in South Florida and rust is a problem. This is a good solution and cheaper than replacing stove parts. They look fine and the Landlord is happy too. It's a good deal and I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Little waste in packaging
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good, and not overkill. After all, it's just bendable aluminum. Package was on my doorstep the next day and as always, great value, great quality, and recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mount

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty straight forward. Disposable to keep you from having to clean the actual bibs. Little oversized for the standard stove so there is a little room to fold it over and clamp it down to keep it from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Thin but it works.
customer_reviews.text: Electric stove. Much thinner than expected, wish they were a bit thicker. However, it beats putting foil on myself and it's a much faster clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Yager

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a time saver
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great time saver because I no longer have to clean the metal burner plates when something spills over or from every day use. I can just change the foil burner cover and replace with a new aluminum foil cover. I love the fact that there are so many of them in both sizes in the package. I will order these again when I finish using the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: they are very durable
customer_reviews.text: they are very durable and can be washed a couple of times before you dispose of them and get another set out of the pack of 50
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than foil
customer_reviews.text: So much better than wrapping the burners in foil. The burners look good and when the liner is ruined just throw away and replace.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great Burner Bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and they fit very well. I have an old Whirlpool in my rental apartment and the correct size drip pans are increasingly hard to find. As such, the burner bibs are a great way to keep the pans clean and serviceable, and they're priced right. Can't get any better.
customer_reviews.author: lvshaun

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find these disposable burner bibs since they've been harder to find in stores lately. I have used the large size bibs and they fit well on my appliance. They are a little thinner than other bibs I've purchased, but it shouldn't be a concern. Overall, these will work for my purposes!
customer_reviews.author: KellyO

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: If you have an older electric stove, you know how liquid from your cookware can spill onto and burn into the drip pans on your stove top. These foil covers are very nice to help prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nah...skip it
customer_reviews.text: Fits awful, not functional, flimsy, and non-returnable. Keep your money. It’s not worth it. I’m better off using my own aluminum foil and doing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jannet

customer_reviews.title: Great  product
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to order and have delivered quickly. Had a hard time finding in many stores. Have a rental property and my cleaner puts fresh bibs on stove for new guests. Makes her job easier and nice fresh touch for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stack is a lot smaller than picture
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I haven't used the burner on which I placed one of the bibs. But, it form fits nicely. I didn't think I had received the order yet because the actual size of the stack of bibs is a lot shorter than the picture which is why I didn't respond earlier. I bought new burner pans at the same time and replaced the old ones and haven't done any messy cooking to need the bibs since I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drip pans clean
customer_reviews.text: These liners work out very well on my cooktop. I never thought of lining the drip pans but what a great idea and so easy to keep the pans clean without scrubbing. I’ll certainly buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum drip pan liners
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they protect my drip pans. They fit my GE range perfectly. These are difficult to find in the store, so I decided to check Amazon and there they were.
customer_reviews.author: albert v.

customer_reviews.title: Saves clean-up
customer_reviews.text: The liners have already saved me from a major clean-up when a pot unexpectedly boiled over. I just threw away the sticky mess on the foil liner and replaced it with another. Each size fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tevington

customer_reviews.title: Great help!
customer_reviews.text: Great help. These little gems go a long way to keeping those ugly burners looking good. Wish I would have thought of this. I'll be ordering more as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: k6omg

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these..
customer_reviews.text: They were not worthy of my time sending them back, I tossed them in the trash. I just took them as a loss they were to small too flimsy just bad, take them off the site. I have several rental houses and the stove is must time consuming I though I could cut some time if these would work . if its to good to be true, its to good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: T624

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit, they do the job, they are awesome. They will protect your burner pans....useful!!!
customer_reviews.author: HD_Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping stove burners clean.
customer_reviews.text: These burner bibs are great for catching spill overs from pots. They can be cleaned and when they get too worn, you can throw them away and replace with a new one. When I run out of replacements, I will reorder them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Williams

customer_reviews.title: The pan replacements where great all four fit good
customer_reviews.text: I really did not like this product they didn’t fit very good I’m sorry they may have worked good for others but not for me I really don’t like complaining but you asked and I would have never told you about it but you did ask
customer_reviews.author: Patsy in Hahira ga

customer_reviews.title: Electric Stove Top Protection
customer_reviews.text: We toss these disposable items and that's fine. Also the packaging was appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Harolynne Bobis

customer_reviews.title: Less scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: These burner bibs save the scrubbing of the ones supplied with the stove. Anything that cuts scrubbing is a"friend of mine."
customer_reviews.author: Buster's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I've needed and been looking for these burner bibs and aluminum foil for years for my old stove. They fit perfectly and make the stove look like new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Tarpey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Saved money buying qty. These have a nice smooth look vs crumple look of some others. Arrived quickly. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chamberland

customer_reviews.title: throw away
customer_reviews.text: liked that they needed no cleaning could just put in garbage. Could have been a bit deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Good product but
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit small but they do what they were intended to do. They were all bent when they arrived but only because they were not packed properly. They are still usable however, I just had to bend them back into shape which is easy. All in all they are a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Too small but works ok.
customer_reviews.text: A little small for standard drip pans. disposable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Use it, throw it away and replace.....easy, peesey....No wipe up needed. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: These don't actually protect your stove.
customer_reviews.text: It's disappointing, but it's too late for me to ask for a refund. I gave these a real chance, which is why it's too late to ask for a refund. They do not do what they claim to do. Splashes and spills find their way under the bibs regularly. They don't catch the overflow, they just hide it until it dries and you have to scrub it off later. And the damage is worse because you don't address the spills and stains right away. I wouldn't buy these again. If I could undo it, I wouldn't waste my money the first time.
customer_reviews.author: nunya

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap and I really don’t like them but it’s the only choice I feel I have. They are too thin. But I guess that’s the idea?
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Last a good while too.
customer_reviews.text: Old fashion rings are easy to clean up and maintain with these.
customer_reviews.author: joanne c

customer_reviews.title: Run over catcher
customer_reviews.text: I like how these bibs can catch run over from a pot and all you have to do is toss it in the garbage and put another bib in burner cover.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable enough to buy when you need them, my first purchase was over a year ago. I am a clean freak when it comes to my kitchen, and these work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Boundy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these range liners- they fit perfectly on my old Westinghouse electric range!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I gave cleaning these items one star, because they are disposable. I would not clean them
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Berretto Offutt

customer_reviews.title: The price is good and shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: These burner bibs fit my stove top perfectly and are so much easier to use than trying to wrap the liners in aluminum foil. The price is good and shipping was fast! Completely satisfied with these!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Gripp

customer_reviews.title: timely delivery, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: the product is good and well priced. The packaging was so tight it bent the bibs, but reshaping these was easy task
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a source to order them.They really protect the chrome wells
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my burners,2 small and 2 large,therefore I have 25 changes.Excellent service,excellent price. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: they fit great.
customer_reviews.text: these fit great, they are thin but if they was thick then the burner would not set down properly. great coverage.

customer_reviews.title: Liners for stove top
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps keep the burners clean. I have used these before & will continue to use them

customer_reviews.title: STOVE BURNER LINERS
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a problem solver! No more using foil to line burner pans. Once messy just toss and insert a new one - easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH WORTHAM

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I came across this product. Hated how gross my stove kept getting and the cost of replacing burners. I'm really looking forward to my stove always looking clean now that I have these.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These burner bibs cost almost half the price of what I have been buying, and they are just as good.

customer_reviews.title: Disposable burner liners help clean up
customer_reviews.text: Disposable burner liners help keep original liners clean and make cleanup easier.

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: They were kind of bent up because of shipping But, if you just want to an easy stop top clean up. I think we have a winner Just toss these babies and install new ones

customer_reviews.title: Seller is misleading customers
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows what seller says and what if is. Completely waste my time. Should got no star.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful things.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years. They help keep your electric stove clean. Change them often as if something gets on them they can catch fire like your stove can.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's a 50 pack
customer_reviews.text: These keep my kitchen looking clean, without the cleaning. When the foil liner gets dirty, I switch it out and there ya good, clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Durable Burner Bibs
customer_reviews.text: It's OK just a bit flimsy and doesn't cover the entire area so I had to line the actual aluminum pan on the range with foil since the bib will really only catch drippings and not protect the aluminum pan on your range.
customer_reviews.author: Jeans

customer_reviews.title: I like that they arrived quickly and were in good condition ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that they arrived quickly and were in good condition and I also liked the amount of burner liners for the price. What I didn't like is that they are so thin. I wish they were a little bit thicker. And it would also be nice if they were a tiny bit bigger so they could actually catch ANY spills. At this point the amount they cover if a spill hits just right it would get in between the burner liner and the metal drip pans
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynn Schamber

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I hated cleaning the stove burners sooo much. This product was exactly what I needed to keep them clean. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly. They more then met my expectation. Wonderful item to keep your stove looking like new!

customer_reviews.title: Just received, haven't tried yet, but will tonight.
customer_reviews.text: I am certain it will be a good product, it's as advertised, is what I expected, and I'm sure it will be just fine.

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: A good price for the number of liners you receive and delivered very quickly. Fit my stove like a glove.

customer_reviews.title: Photo is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The photo is misleading - the stack is about 1/16 as tall as shown in the picture - because they are so thin and flimsy.

customer_reviews.text: The burner bibs fit our electric stove burners just fine. They're disposable, but work as intended.

customer_reviews.title: Just What Your Oven Burners Need
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. They fit my stove perfectly and work great plus they are of good strong material.

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: The burner bibs fit our older Jenn-Air electric stove top. I've had no problems with them so far. One suggestion for improvement: it would be nice if they were in a bag that they could be stored in rather than wrapped in thin plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup with teenagers
customer_reviews.text: these work great in my house. I have teenagers that like to not clean up after themselves so to be able to throw it away at the end of their messy cooking session makes clean-up a breeze!

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity + fast shipping!

customer_reviews.title: Getting my purchase on time and in good order.

customer_reviews.title: The burner bibs are great. They fit very well
customer_reviews.text: The burner bibs are great. They fit very well. They have made it much easier to keep my stove clean. The seller’s description was very accurate and the delivery was on time. I would highly recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit nicely in my stove eyes. I haven’t cooked with them yet, but I do like the way they look.

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a little easier.
customer_reviews.text: Great to help ease the chore of cleaning the stove. Takes 2 of each small/large to do the job and this 50 pack will mean I have no excuse to put things off and I don't have to scrounge up liners.
customer_reviews.author: Al Smith

customer_reviews.title: I could easily cut the bibs to adjust them to my particular ...
customer_reviews.text: met my needs perfectly. I could easily cut the bibs to adjust them to my particular burners. Delivery very fast. NOTE half of the burner bibs come in small size, the other half in the big size.

So we had to return them.

customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that I paid $17.99 for pack of 50 for what I thought would be better quality liners. Clearly I could have bought the 50 pack for $11.99 for the same quality. Don't be fooled by the word "durable." That's why I paid $6 more. I guarantee there is no difference in the quality which is not very good. They are quite thin and flimsy.

product_meta.title: Pack of 50 Disposable Durable Burner Bibs for Electric and Gas Range Stoves - Aluminum Foil Round Burner Cover Liners - Great for Avoiding Cleanup from Oil & Food Dripping - (25 Large & 25 Small)
product_meta.description:
Are You Tired of Having to Clean Your Electric Burner Stove Again and Again?

Worried About Making a Mess Whenever You Think of Trying to Make Something New?

Do You Want a Solution That’s Both Cost-Effective and Easy to Implement?

Then this pack of 50 Disposable Electric Burner Bibs is exactly what you need to let you cook what you want, when you want and how you want without having to worry about cleaning up the burner mess the follows.

Top Grade, Heavy Duty Material & Easy to Install!
Protect Your Electric Burner from spills and oil with our aluminum foil stove burner covers, these premium protectors will catch every drip from your pans to make sure the burner stays clean. Just lift, dispose and replace – it’s really that simple and easy to use for home chefs, professional chefs in restaurants or deli and for moms at home!
